::Zardus::

Zardus slows down as his comm-link plays back the message sent by the new 
mercenary group. He activates his comm-link, disguising his frequency as one 
that would come from a maximal communication unit.

"Interesting...." He says with no form of introduction, "I may require a bot 
or two killed....."
